title: Hey Riot... Just a small question about DJ Sona...
body:
Hi there Riot,

I was just wondering, since that DJ Sona is the new ultimate skin, what does the clues given by Wizardcrab and Morello about the upcoming Ultimate skin earlier relate to Sona? (As that would explain a lot)

Earlier in August, there was a really convincing post, explaining that Shaco would be the lucky winner for the new Ultimate skin. (Courtesy to adminpwnsu, Check it out here: http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1855539)

**The clues were: **
Six S
Hide
Assassin
J

(According to Morello) The champion getting the Ultimate skin have "A" as the 4th letter of one of his abilities. (I understand that Sona's W, Aria of Perseverance applies to this clue)

And finally, a post by WizardCrab: 541daw6s5d41a6s5d

If it could be explained, then it would be much appreciated!
Keep up the great work Riot!

replies.body:
six s could be six skins or to do with how many s's in their ability's, skin names etc
Hide maybe means jukes or stealth the j points to jukes 
Assassin is to do with Assassin 
J jukes or something to do with ability name or Jungle
A Evelyn's Ravage 

Evelyn has 6's 
Classic (2)(her classic skin)
Secondary  (3)
Shadow Walk (4)
Hate Spike(5)
Agony's Embrace(6)

Hide:
She has stealth.

Assassin:
She is an assassin.

J:
She can juke?? or Jungle :O


I think I might have just solved the clues do I get a prize?

> [{quoted}](name=Doin Rocks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hhteFdl4,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-02-06T13:27:18.801+0000)
>
> Illuminati confirmed

SHHHHHHH I didn't want anyone to spoil it
The next ultimate skin has already been confirmed. Why are you speculating it's Evelynn? OP is asking how those clues relate to Sona, not if they could hint to another champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hhteFdl4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-05T23:30:42.360+0000)
>
> The next ultimate skin has already been confirmed. Why are you speculating it's Evelynn? OP is asking how those clues relate to Sona, not if they could hint to another champion.

well they don't 100% she isn't an assassin, she can't hide(except in bushes), she doesn't have six s's and I believe she was all ready in the process of being created by Riot so these clues are for the next skin

Also yes I know Shaco has been confirmed but Evelyn is probably as plausible if not more
